item.title: codeforces
item.description: codeforces 目录A. Candies and Two SistersB. Construct the StringC. Two Teams ComposingD. Anti-SudokuE. Three Blocks PalindromeA. Candies and Two Sisters 题目： There are two sisters Alice and Betty. You have n candies. You want to distribute these n candies between two sisters in such a way that: lice will get a (a>0) candies; Betty will get b (b>0) candies; each sister will get some integer
